DOC.brief_title: FSH/LH Ratio Predictor IVF Outcome Young Older Women
DOC.detailed_description: All woman normal uterine cavity determine previous hysterosalpingography hysteroscopy . Women abnormally low Gn hypothalamic hypogonadism , High LH PCOS woman abnormal endocrine function abnormal thyroid adrenal function exclude . Any woman ovarian cyst azopermic male partner also exclude . The patient subject history taking , include age , duration , type cause infertility medical history . Full examination include general abdominal vaginal examination do follow ultrasound evaluation presence 3 pre-antral follicle exclusion ovarian cyst . Basal day 3 hormonal evaluation FSH , LH E2 natural cycle do . E2 , FSH LH level determine use Immulite system ( Siemens Healthcare diagnostics , UK ) .The intra- inter-assay coefficient variation 15 % 16 % E2 , 4.8 % 26 % LH . FSH analytical sensitivity 0.1 mIU/ml . All participant underwent long protocol . Daily SC injection Triptorelin : Decapeptyl 0.1 mg ( Ferring , Switzerland ) 0.1 mg start day 21 cycle prior stimulation cycle continue till day hCG injection . Gn stimulation start fulfil stimulation start criterion thin endometrium < 5 mm low E2 < 50 LH < 5IU/l [ 18 ] either HMG ( Menogon ; Ferring , Switzerland ) rFSH ( Gonal-f ; Merck Serono , Germany ) start dose 150-300 IU/day depend patient age previous gonadotropin response . dose adjust accord ovarian response monitor serum E2 ultrasound evaluation . All patient follow Transvaginal ultrasound scan daily alternate day accord ovarian response treatment start treatment cycle day ( 6 ) folliculometry endometrial thickness pattern . Triggering HCG 10000 IU IM ( Pregnyl , Organon , Netherlands ) least 2 follicle reach mean diameter 18 mm [ 18 ] Cycle cancellation decide transvaginal ultrasound scan cycle day ( 9 ) reveal adequate follicular growth ( < 3 mature follicle ) . Ovum pick-up ( OPU ) do 34-36 hour hCG injection transvaginal ultrasound guide . Metaphase II ocytes analyze . ICSI procedure perform case . Fertilization assess 16-18 h ICSI embryo quality evaluate 2 3 day ICSI determine accord number blastomere degree fragmentation multinucleation [ 19 ] . Oocytes collect embryos cultured ISM1culture medium ( Origio medicult medium , Denmark ) . Transfer cleave embryos do day 3 oocyte retrieval ( use Labotect semi-rigid catheter ; labotect GmbH , Germany ) All patient receive luteal support form daily progesterone ( Prontogest , Amsa , Italy ) 100 mg IM daily start day ovum retrieval [ 18 ] till day hCG test . Serum β hCG level assess day 14 ET . The primary outcome parameter evaluate clinical pregnancy ( define presence gestational sac contain fetal heart ultrasound scan ) . Other parameter include occurrence multiple pregnancy , Abortion ectopic case per pregnancy , dose Gn , duration stimulation , E2 Progesterone level day HCG triggering , endometrial thickness day HCG triggering , number follicle > 16 mm , number retrieve follicle , number oocyte fertilize , number good ET cancellation rate . The participant divide accord age 2 group : Group 1 < 35 year old subdivide accord FSH/LH ratio G1A FSH/LH ratio < 2 G1B FSH/LH ratio ≥2 . Group 2 ≥ 35 year old subdivide accord FSH/LH ratio G2A FSH/LH ratio < 2 G2B FSH/LH ratio ≥2 . The use cutoff value support previous study [ 20,21 ]
